comments: Read all of her notes, read all of the chapters, do all of your homework, assignments, projects, go to class, and you will get a good grade. She is passionate about public relations and she made the class fun and it didn\'t seem so long at times. At the end of the semester do ALL of the extra credit!

comments: Stacy Long was one of the greatest professors I\'ve ever had. She is so informative and her lectures are so interesting, that an hour & a half class feels like 30 minutes. She\'s hilarious, smart, intelligent, and a down to earth person. I wish she could teach all of my classes. I highly recommend her to everyone wanting to take a PR class!

tag_professor: Respected (3)  Amazing lectures (2)  Inspirational (2)  Hilarious (2)  Gives good feedback (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Stacy is the perfect professor to take if you are truly interested in a future in PR. Not only did she make me more confident in the field I hope to pursue, but she made me feel like it was fun and rewarding. She\'s passionate about PR and is real about it. I was afraid taking a PR class would make me shy away from PR, but it only drew me closer.
